-也能当作发饰

translation.en: -No, he made up his own mind. -Good job, Rob!

-不 是他自己决定的

translation.en: Well, he's only paying for his airfare

translation.en: but we get 5,000 words in the magazine and our picture on the front cover.

而且照片上杂志封面加

translation.en: That makes it all worthwhile. Right there.
-Well, if you get him to the top. -If?
translation.zh:
-你如果能把带领他到高峰的话…
-如果？

-There you go. You all right? -Thanks, Guy. Cheers, mate.

-给你 你还好吧？
-盖 谢谢你 朋友
我知道 我像是…庞然大物

translation.en: Yeah, you know, I'm just gonna miss you.

translation.en: It's just the doing nothing back here that's making me worry.

-你真的给人送信？
-是的 我真给人送信

translation.en: -I know. -Well, how do you know that?
You, my friends, are following in some very famous footsteps.

我的朋友们
你们现在正跟随着名人的脚步

translation.en: A history made famous by George Everest,
translation.zh: 踏上一段由乔治埃佛勒斯

translation.en: George Mallory, Tenzing Norgay, Edmund Hillary.
translation.zh:
乔治马洛里、丹增诺盖
以及艾德蒙希拉里写下的历史之路

translation.en: For those of you who dare face their dreams,

translation.en: Adventure Consultants offers something beyond the power of words to describe.

冒险顾问团队将会提供
无法用言语形容的体验

translation.en: And why don't we describe it in the brochure?

因为那大多数会是痛苦的体验

translation.en: And the odd, if you don't mind, Mike,

还可能会发生什么事
麦克你不介意吧？

translation.en: To put it simply, guys, human beings simply aren't built to function

translation.en: at the cruising altitude of a 747.
Okay, once we get above here, above the South Col
our bodies will be literally dying. And I mean literally dying.

translation.en: It's not called the Death Zone for nothing, guys.

translation.en: can we get you up to the top and down to the bottom

我们能否在这状况发生前
安全地带你们…
先生女士们 这是贝克威德斯

translation.en: You might have noticed a bit of the Lone Star State?

你们也许已经注意到了

百分百纯种德州人 各位
你们已经会见了麦克格如

-请叫我哈罗德

严格来说是来自塔拉纳基区
大家好（毛利土语）

海伦与其他队员
正在前往基地营区的途中

translation.en: They're setting it up for when we get there.

translation.en: I plan on going for the summit May 10.

translation.en: It's been a lucky day for me and Adventure Consultants

translation.en: and the weather's usually pretty stable around then.

translation.en: we have 40 days to train your bodies and your minds
translation.zh:
我们有40天的时间
来锻练各位的身心…

translation.en: Now, I know there's a lot of mountaineering experience in this room.

我知道这个房间里
聚集了许多登山老手

translation.en: You wouldn't be here without it.

没有丝毫登山经验
是不会选择来这里的
斯图 征服过喀喇昆仑山K2峰

征服过海拔1192米的

translation.en: Six of the Seven Summits and the only woman.

是成功征服了世界

translation.en: But Everest, though, is another beast, another beast altogether.

但要征服珠穆朗玛峰
是完全不一样的挑战

translation.en: That's why you're here, isn't that right, Dougie?

translation.en: So, listen. Tonight, that's it from me. Eat, drink, be merry.

我们明天开始长途跋涉

Take your seats, buckle in, everyone.

呼叫布拉沃410

-准备好了

Guys, man wants to see your climbing permits.

你上次离山峰多近距离？

translation.en: Well, I got real close but it got late and I was

translation.en: Well, I think I would have made a run for it.

但你付我钱
是为了我能把你安全带下山

translation.en: It's not good. They had to bring him down.

欢迎来到基地营区！

translation.en: Got the IMAX team, South Africans.
in the best spot of all,
we have the Adventure Consultants Base Camp.
-Good to see you. Thank you. -Welcome, nice to see you.
For those of you that haven't met, this is Helen Wilton,

为素未谋面的各位介绍
这是海伦威尔顿…

translation.en: She will be your mom for the next few weeks.

translation.en: Any problems, take it to her and she'll sort it.
All right, well, it's very nice to finally meet you all in person.

translation.en: He's your climbing sirdar, your lead Sherpa.

translation.en: -Bet you climb better than I do. -Yeah.

translation.en: All right, all right. I hear ya, I hear ya.
All right, well, there's tea in the mess tent when you've dumped your sacks

大家放好了行李后
请到用餐区享用热茶…

translation.en: and the comms tent's down the back, that's the cooking tent, and over there

translation.en: It's a little bit drafty, but just remember that

translation.en: when the wind gets up here, you've got the same view that George Everest did.

风大的时候 你们看到的是
和乔治埃佛勒斯当年一样的风景

the left and rights are marked with an "L" and an "R," so you can't get it wrong.

左右鞋标记着“左”和“右”
你们不会弄错
明白吗？这个很容易使用

translation.en: First of all, you push it into the shoe with this.

translation.en: If it isn't the mayor of Base Camp!

坐下来 适应一下环境！

translation.en: Okay. I'm normally a tea man myself, but let's give it a go.

今年真是热闹 对吗？

translation.en: I know, man. Some idiot Kiwi goes and invents Himalayan guiding
translation.zh:
对 都多亏那位掀起
登山向导热潮的新西兰人…

translation.en: Yeah, it didn't take you too long to get in on the act.
You went ahead and fixed the icefalls, I see.

translation.en: -It's pretty messy up there this year. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-今年山上的状况不太妙
-是吗？

translation.en: Crevasses are pretty big. Strung four or five ladders across.

冰隙裂缝挺大
我们跨串起了四到五条绳索

translation.en: You used good ropes though, didn't you?

translation.en: You ready? Okay. This is April 7th, about 10:30 a.m.,
translation.zh:
准备好了？
今天是4月7号 早上大约10点半

translation.en: this is Sandy Hill Pittman, reporting for NBC Interactive Media
translation.zh:
我是桑迪希尔皮特曼
为互动媒体报导…

translation.en: and we are officially at Everest Base Camp!
translation.zh:
我们正式抵达
珠穆朗玛峰基地营区了！

translation.en: Yeah. Someone went and stole my journalist
translation.zh: 有人抢走了我的杂志记者…

translation.en: so I had to get another one.
translation.zh: 我不得已只好找来候补

translation.en: She's a lot easier on the eye than Jon Krakauer
translation.zh: 她看起来比乔恩克拉考尔顺眼多了…

translation.en: -that's for sure. -Listen, just to be clear,

translation.zh: 我并没有抢走你的记者

translation.en: Outside magazine gave me a call.
-Said they wanted to-- -It's all good, man.
They were gonna send a journalist up the hill and asked me if I was interested.
translation.zh:
他们要派一位记者上山
问我是否有兴趣帮忙

translation.en: It was his call in the end.
translation.zh: 最终还是得看他本人的选择

translation.en: All right, Caroline MacKenzie, team doctor. Why don't you kick it off, Caro.
translation.zh: 卡罗琳麦肯齐队医 你不如自我介绍

translation.en: So Rob and Harold and Mike will tell you all sorts of stuff about mountaineering,
translation.zh:
罗布 哈罗德以及麦克会
告诉各位有关登山的种种技巧…

translation.en: getting you to the top of Everest is really about oxygen.
translation.zh: 但以医学的角度… 能否成功登上高峰

translation.en: To give you the best chance of summiting
you need to prepare your bodies for the thin air up there.
translation.zh: 就得锻练身体适应高海拔稀薄的空气

translation.en: So, over the next month, before the final ascent
translation.zh: 在接下来的一个月 直到最终登顶…

translation.en: you're gonna make three partial acclimatizing ascents
translation.zh: 你们得适应三次的半登山体验…

translation.en: returning here to Base Camp after each one.
translation.zh: 每次都得回归到基地营区

translation.en: The bad news is that each ascent begins and ends with the Icefall.
translation.zh:
坏消息是每次登山的
起点和终点都环绕在冰瀑边

translation.en: I'm sorry, but there is no way around it.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们别无选择

translation.en: There are millions of tons of glacial ice continually moving day and night.
translation.zh: 这里早晚都有上万顿不停移动的冰川

translation.en: You got seracs the size of tower blocks,
translation.zh: 还有如同高楼体积的冰塔…

translation.en: you got crevasses so deep they probably don't even have a bottom.
It is not a place that you wanna get caught hanging out in,
especially when the sun hits it.
So we're gonna be up nice and early and through that as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 所以我们得尽早出发跨越冰隙处

translation.en: Now the Sherpas have gone ahead and fixed the ladders across the crevasses
translation.zh: 当地族人已经修复好冰隙的绳索…

translation.en: and we've made it as safe as we possibly can.
translation.zh: 我们也尽可能的提高了安全度

translation.en: But that is not to say that it is completely safe.
Nineteen people have died in that Icefall.
translation.zh: 已有19人摔死在那座冰瀑中

-你还好吗 乔恩？
-还可以吗？
请大家切记 我们是一个团队

translation.en: Let's look out for each other.

translation.zh: （第一营区 海拔5944米） 注意低温症的症状…

translation.en: things like slurred speech and irrational behavior.
translation.zh: 像口齿不清或非理性行为

translation.en: I've seen hypoxic climbers rip off all their clothes at 8,000 meters
translation.zh:
我有见证过患者
在海拔8000米把衣服拔光…

translation.en: You all know about cerebral edema, the swelling of your brain
translation.zh: 你们都知道脑水肿 大脑开始肿胀…

translation.en: to the point of loss of motor function and eventually death.
translation.zh: 直到身体器官衰竭甚至死亡

translation.en: And pulmonary edema, which is your lungs filling with fluid
translation.zh: 还有肺气肿 当肺部严重积水…

translation.en: The only cure is to get down the mountain, fast.
translation.zh: 唯一治疗的办法就是立即下山

translation.en: But it is not all doom and gloom here, okay?
translation.zh:
但这里不是
只有令人沮丧的事 好吗？

translation.en: Myself and the whole AC team are here to make sure you get up and down safely
translation.zh:
我和整个团体会确保
大家能够安全的征服高峰…
也会帮助各位自然地适应环境

translation.en: So why don't we all give Caro a nice big thank you, it's her first time here.
translation.zh:
我们给卡罗鼓掌
这是她首次的登山体验

translation.en: See, you want to get on the regulator. You want to hear that hiss.
translation.zh: 你得开上调解器 直到发出声音

translation.en: Can I get a hit of that?
In a situation like this, you just wanna catch your breath, throw it up to four.

在这种情况下
你得大口喘气 把调解器开到最大

translation.en: -You should start feeling pretty good. -I can feel it already.
Well, when we get back to Base, I want you to get Caro to take a look at you.
translation.zh:
我们回到基地营区后
我会叫卡罗好好给你检查一下

translation.en: -No. I'm all right, I'm okay. -No, no.
And do me a favor, spend your night on oxygen.
translation.zh: 拜托 晚上开着氧气瓶吧

translation.en: Just lift your shirt up a bit.
And take a deep breath for me?
Just take one of those in the morning with a bit of water, before breakfast.
-Right, Beck, you're up. -Sorry. Here, go for it.
translation.zh:
-轮到你了 贝克
-抱歉 来吧
你的状况好极了 贝克

translation.en: -You are. -Six days a week in the gym.
-Ought to do it. -Your wife must love that.
translation.zh:
-风雨无阻
-你妻子一定爱透了

translation.en: I need to send a message to my wife. Can I use your fax?
translation.zh:
我得给妻子传信息
能够用你的传真机吗？

translation.en: You might wanna look at this one first. It came in for you last night.
translation.zh: 你先看看这个 这是昨晚传给你的

-怎么了？

translation.en: Can I use your sat phone?
translation.zh: 我能借用你的卫星电话吗？

translation.en: Well, if this did come in last night, it's an emergency.

-收费是一分钟25元 贝克
-好的
不用了 这次算我们的

translation.en: I'm at Base Camp right now.
Yeah, it's a satellite phone, honey.
translation.zh: 是的 是用卫星电话 宝贝

translation.en: My God, how much is that costing? What's the problem?
translation.zh:
天啊 那要花多少钱？
出了什么问题？

translation.en: I'm sorry, we were up at Camp Two and that's why I didn't send you a fax yesterday.
translation.zh:
抱歉 我们昨天都在第二营区
所以没能给你发传真

translation.en: doing his homework in the morning, as per usual.
You wanna say hi to him?
Well, yeah, of course I do.
And Meg went on her first date... -...last weekend. -Mom!
translation.zh: 还有梅格上周末赴了第一次的约会

translation.en: Listen, I gotta get the kids to school
translation.zh: 我得准备带孩子们上学了…
我想他大概是感到害怕

translation.en: Here, come in, mate, come on!
You don't dance, you don't climb!
No dance, no climb! No dance, no climb!
Hey, man. Breaking into the rations?
translation.zh: 嘿 开始吃备用粮食了？

translation.en: No. I'll wait till we summit.
translation.zh: 不了 我等登山后再享用

translation.en: I don't know about that, Neal.

translation.zh: 我们一定会成功征服的

translation.en: Anyway, me and Anatoli are here to help you, you know?
translation.zh:
再说 我和阿纳托利
都会协助你的 知道吗？
竞争太激烈了 托利

translation.en: We don't need competition between people.
translation.zh: 我们无需与人类之间的竞争

translation.en: There is competition between every person and this mountain.
translation.zh: 这里的每个人都必须与山峰战斗

translation.en: The last word always belongs to the mountain.
translation.zh: 而战胜的永远是大自然
哈罗德和麦克 我是罗布

-我是麦克
-行不通了 朋友

translation.en: let's get 'em off the face and back down to Base Camp. Turn around.
translation.zh: 离开山面折返回基地营区

translation.en: -Ang Dorjee, come on, we're going down. -Okay.
translation.zh: 昂多吉 快 我们得下去

translation.en: Keep clenching, just keep the blood flowing.
We're still waiting for the South Africans.
Hey, Ian. You haven't paid for these ladders.
translation.zh: 喂 伊恩 你还没付绳索的费用

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Your Yak Fund money's coming.
translation.zh: 是的 你的牦牛基金就快到手了

translation.en: -You serious, man? -Come on, get a move on.
How long you been waiting here?

translation.zh:
-足足有45分钟了
-天啊 真冷
对 特别是在山顶的时候

translation.en: -Hey, Rob, we gotta get 'em over. -We're working on it.
translation.zh:
-罗布 我们得聚集大家
-我们正在尝试

-麦克 我现在就把他送来！
-好的

translation.en: That's it. No, head up, mate, head up.
translation.zh: 就是这样 不 把头抬起 朋友

translation.en: -Are these ladders gonna take two? -Yeah, I'll get a rope, I'll belay you.
translation.zh:
-绳索能承受两个人的重量吗？
-能 我替你扎绳

translation.en: -Just stay right where you are, mate. -I can't pull myself up!
translation.zh:
-留在原地 贝克
-我没法把自己拉起来！

translation.en: I'm gonna come out to you.
-Got it for you. -Right, tie me in, Scott, tie me in.
translation.zh:
-弄好了
-好的 替我绑上 史考特

-依靠扎绳？
-知道了 就用扎绳

translation.en: Right, I'm coming out to you, Beck. Here I come, mate.
translation.zh: 我现在来救你 贝克

translation.en: Nice and easy, you're tied in, mate.
translation.zh: 放松点 我替你绑好了 伙伴

translation.en: -I can't feel my hands. -You're looking good.
translation.zh:
-我的双手失去知觉了
-没事了

translation.en: -Grab me! -Stay right where you are, mate.
-I'm right here, I'm coming to you. -I can't pull myself up!
translation.zh:
-我就在这里 正靠近你
-我无法把自己拉起来！

translation.en: There's no guarantee to the summit, I get it.
translation.zh: 我明白你无法保证我会成功征服山峰

translation.en: But to get killed because I'm waiting in line like I'm in freaking Walmart.
translation.zh:
但因为得像超市买东西那样排长队
而被冻死

translation.en: That's not why I paid you $65,000.
translation.zh: 我付你6万5美金可不是为了这

translation.en: Now get me off of here.
That's it. Plant your feet one at a time.
translation.zh: 就这样 一步一步走

translation.en: All right, thanks for coming by.
translation.zh: 好了 谢谢你们前来帮忙

translation.en: Look, Base Camp's, you know, chockablock full this year, so,
translation.zh: 今年基地营区的人数太多了…

translation.en: I think it would all benefit us greatly by coming together like this
and, you know, working out some kind of plan and schedule.
translation.zh: 互相协调好登山的先后次序

translation.en: What, like some kind of rota?
translation.zh: 你是说作出一个时间表？

translation.en: Everyone knows Everest is a business for you, Robert, are you kidding?
translation.zh:
大家都知道你靠珠穆朗玛峰赚钱
但这是闹着玩的吧 罗布？

translation.en: What gives you the right to tell us when we can climb and when we can't?
translation.zh: 你凭什么指定我们的登山时间？

translation.en: I'm not telling you, mate. I'm asking.
translation.zh: 这只是个提议 朋友

translation.en: If we know when everybody's planning to summit, for instance,
translation.zh: 我们若能安排好登山次序…

translation.en: we can avoid the chaos that happened in the Icefall today.
translation.zh: 就能避免像今天在冰瀑发生的意外

translation.en: Adventure Consultants are aiming for May 10.
translation.zh:
冒险顾问团队计划了
在5月10号登山

translation.en: Okay, that's bumper-to-bumper traffic on the Hillary Step.
translation.zh: 那会在希拉里台阶造成长长的人龙

translation.en: Yes, it is, that's my point.
Look, this is ridiculous. We're summiting when we want.
translation.zh:
这是无稽之谈
我们有自由选择登山的日子

translation.en: All right? And I don't need your permission to climb the mountain.
Ian, have you seen how many people are here at Base Camp?
translation.zh: 伊恩 你有看到基地营区的人数吗？

translation.en: -We're finished here. Come on, guys. -Ian! Hey, man.
Have a drink, Rob! Come on, man.
translation.zh: 喝一些吧 罗布 拜托

translation.en: -You feeling a little crook? -No, it's just a little...
translation.zh:
-你感觉不适 对吗？
-不是的 只是…

translation.en: Little touch of the Delhi belly.
translation.zh: 有些拉肚子（印度惯用语）

-他是指肠胃不适（尼泊尔惯用语）
-也许是吃了桑迪的鱼子酱

translation.en: I told you not to have the Dom Perignon with it!
translation.zh: 我说过了别和香槟一起食用！

translation.en: I don't like the look of the crowds on the ropes.
translation.zh: 我担心使用绳索的大量人数

translation.en: I think we're gonna have some trouble once we get above Camp Three.
translation.zh: 我想我们一抵达第三营区就会出事

translation.en: I mean, you wanna top it on the 10th, yeah?
translation.zh: 你说过想在10号登顶 对吗？

translation.en: What, are you saying we should team up?
I don't know, man. We have different styles, man.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我们的登山方式大不相同

translation.en: All due respect, you're a hand-holder. I mean, the best, but...
translation.zh:
你对待登山者的
细心引导是很令人尊敬…

translation.en: I just believe that if you can't get up there yourself
translation.zh: 但我的看法是想要战胜高峰…

translation.en: you shouldn't be on the mountain at all.
You guide your team, I guide mine.
translation.zh: 我们照常带领各自团队

translation.en: I'm just suggesting that we work with each other instead of against.
translation.zh:
我想提议的是大家
相互配合而不是互相较量

translation.en: The only way we both summit, mate, is if we work together.
translation.zh: 我们必须一起合作才能征服山峰

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah, I see the sense in it.
translation.zh:
-怎么样？
-好 我了解你的看法
很好 我们就这样说定了

translation.en: Who's gonna lead when we get up there?
translation.zh: 我们抵达山峰时 要听谁的指令？

translation.en: Rob. If I say I will do it, it will be done.
translation.zh: 罗布 我答应了你就一定会办到

translation.en: You gotta work with Ang Dorjee, because we're working together now.
translation.zh: 你必须和昂多吉合作 我们同队

translation.en: I'm just saying, if both of us...
translation.zh: 我是说 若我们彼此…

translation.en: We'll work together and we'll get the job done. Yes?
translation.zh: 我们会携手完成工作 对吗？

translation.en: We're planning on stashing, what, eight bottles of O
-Well, I'm not using O. -What do you mean?
translation.zh:
-我是不会使用氧气瓶的
-什么意思？

translation.en: You're not using oxygen at all?
-Come on, man. You know you want to. -English air. Don't need it.
translation.zh:
-拜托 你需要的
-我不需要这种西方物品

translation.en: Yeah, but Anatoli, you're guiding for Scott this year.
translation.zh: 阿纳托利 你今年是替史考特领队

translation.en: You have people's lives in your hands. It's a job.
translation.zh: 你得负责人命 这是份工作
我从未使用也永不使用

translation.en: Bigger problems if you run out.
I'll put some more bottles of O up there.
Just so long as you guys are clear.
If you work for me, you use oxygen, otherwise you don't work for me.
translation.zh: 想替我打工就一定得用氧气瓶

translation.en: You don't have to ask, mate.
I've been up there before without O's, Rob. I don't need to do it with clients.
translation.zh:
我试过不用氧气瓶也能登山
罗布 这次也行

translation.en: All right, next we have to fix ropes.
translation.zh: 好的 接下来我们得牢固绳索

translation.en: Hillary Step need new fixed rope. And South-East Ridge as well.
translation.zh: 希拉里台阶与东南山脊也是

translation.en: My idea is that we work together and we fix ropes together.
translation.zh: 我的计划是大家携手修复绳索

translation.en: All right, you and Lopsang maybe get together.
translation.zh: 好了 你和洛普桑一起商讨吧

translation.en: Talk about who wants to fix what and where, okay?
Only essentials. I'm not gonna tell you what to pack, but be brutal. Okay?
translation.zh:
我不会限定你们
但只能带基本用品 明白吗？

translation.en: One pound down here is like 10 up there.
translation.zh:
在这里的每一磅重量
到了山峰就会乘以十倍
动作一定要能轻便和迅速

translation.en: What, and just like that, you kill my summit cappuccino.
translation.zh:
什么嘛 这样我就不能在登顶后
喝卡布奇诺了

translation.en: All right, it's gonna be a tough week.
translation.zh: 大家听好 这会是艰难的一周

translation.en: But it is gonna be the best Friday of your lives.
translation.zh: 但也会是你们毕生最棒的星期五

translation.en: Yeah, what are we doing again on Friday?
-Now it's up to me, right? -Yes it is, yes it is.
translation.zh:
-现在轮到我了？
-是的 没错

translation.en: I knew it was gonna be a girl. I can't believe it.
translation.zh:
我就知道会是个女孩
我无法相信这是真的

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, Doug. Cheers, mate.
Mid-July, as soon as I get back.
translation.zh: 七月中 就在我回返的时候

translation.en: -You better sleep now, buddy. -Yeah, that's true.
translation.zh:
-你该休息了 朋友
-是的 喂 罗布

translation.en: Jan doesn't mind you being here?
translation.zh: 珍不介意你常处在山上？

translation.en: It's okay. Jan's a climber, Jon, she gets it.
translation.zh:
没关系 乔恩
珍也是登山者所以她能够谅解

translation.en: What about you, Doug? What about your wife?
translation.zh: 你呢 道格？你妻子有何看法？

translation.en: She's been fine with it, ever since we divorced.
translation.zh: 我们自从离婚后 她就不介意了

translation.en: She's been great with everything since then.
translation.zh: 可以算是什么都不介意

translation.en: No, no, no, I ask because Peach said to me,
translation.zh: 我会提问是因为桃子曾对我说…

translation.en: "If you climb one more mountain, I will divorce you."
translation.zh:
“你若再登一座山峰
我就跟你离婚”

translation.en: And you went ahead and then booked this trip!
translation.zh: 那你还加入这次的登山活动！

translation.en: No, no, no, the worst part of it
is that I kind of forgot to tell her.
translation.zh: 我这次登山忘了告诉她

translation.en: You don't forget to tell her you're climbing Everest!
I forgot to tell her, I did.
All right. It's all on the table, here.
translation.zh: 好了 大家都聊开了

translation.en: It hurts, it's dangerous, it destroys relationships,
translation.zh: 登山即痛苦危险 也导致关系破裂…

translation.en: it's costing you all a small fortune.
Are there any negative aspects to this game?
translation.zh: 这项嗜好的坏处还有哪些？

translation.en: I gotta ask the question, you know I do.
translation.zh: 你知道我必须问这个问题

translation.en: That's why. Thank you, Mr. Mallory.
translation.zh: 正是如此 谢谢你 马洛先生

translation.en: Yasuko. Why are you climbing Everest?
translation.zh: 康子 你为何要登上珠穆朗玛峰？

translation.en: I have reached six of the seven summits, so...
translation.zh: 世界的七大高峰 我已征服了六座…

translation.en: Of course, now I have to reach the seventh.
translation.zh: 我当然得征服最后一座
你并没有回答我的问题
我问的是 为何要登山？

-拜托 告诉他们有关那孩子的事
-什么事？

translation.en: Yeah, I have kids, but, I thought I told you,
translation.zh: 是的 我不是告诉过你…

translation.en: there's an elementary school, back home.
translation.zh: 在我的家乡有一间小学

translation.en: And I've been going and talking to the kids there
translation.zh: 我常常到那里和小孩谈天…

translation.en: and they actually helped me raise some of the money to come
translation.zh: 他们还为我凑了这次的经费…

translation.en: and gave me a flag to plant on the summit, and...
translation.zh: 要我在山峰上插上旗子…

translation.en: So, I was thinking, maybe it's...
They see a regular guy can,
translation.zh: 他们如果见识到一个普通人…

translation.en: you know, follow impossible dreams, maybe they'll be inspired
translation.zh:
也能够完成不可能的梦想
也许能启发他们…

translation.en: to do the same, I guess.
Because to be able to climb that high
and see that kind of beauty that nobody ever sees,
translation.zh: 见证那罕见的壮观美景…

translation.en: it'd be a crime not to.

translation.zh: 明明就有 你这个骗子

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I'm good, I'm better. I'm better now, I'm...
translation.zh: 我很好 现在好多了…

translation.en: We go for the final ascent tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们明天就进入最终登顶
所以说 星期五就会登上最高峰？

translation.en: Yeah, I think we're gonna get a good window.
translation.zh: 我想我们会有足够的时间

translation.en: And did you go to the doctor, did you get a scan done?
And? Come on. What did she look like?
translation.zh: 然后呢？快说 她长得怎样？

translation.en: You know. Blonde hair, nice smile,
translation.zh: 你知道的 金发 灿烂的笑容…

translation.en: perfect height-to-weight ratio, she's gonna be a great climber.
translation.zh:
有着完美的身高比例
她会是个登山强手

translation.en: A little me, a little you.
and our little Sarah, we'll all go climbing together.
translation.zh: 还有我们的小莎拉一同登山
是的 你认为这名字如何？

translation.en: Take it easy, now. You're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 放轻松 你会没事的 （第一营区 海拔5944米）

translation.en: We're gonna get you down the hill. All right?
translation.zh: 我们安全的带你下山 好吗？
喂 尼尔 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, Dale, he doesn't look too good.
translation.zh: 是啊 戴尔 他气色看起来不太好

translation.en: You can't get Scott on the radio?
translation.zh: 你用无线机联系上史考特了吗？

translation.en: Nope. Nah, I think he's up ahead.
translation.zh: 还没有 他应该在山的前方

translation.en: Best not to stare too long at the summit.
That's a long way to go, man.
translation.zh: 还有好一段路程 朋友

translation.en: Head down, one step at a time.
translation.zh: 把头往下 一步一步走

translation.en: Yeah, I did, he wasn't looking too good,
translation.zh: 有 他气色看起来不太好…

translation.en: but Neal seemed to have a handle on the situation.
translation.zh: 但尼尔好像在处理此事

translation.en: Tried to get you on the radio.
translation.zh: 我有尝试用无线机联系你
这东西失效了 对吧？

translation.en: I'm going down to Camp One.
If he's not doing so well, I'm gonna take him down to Base Camp
translation.zh:
他若还是不适
我会把他带到基地营区…

translation.en: and I'll head back up. You guys all right?
translation.zh:
再跟你们会合
你们自己应付得来吗？

translation.en: He can't be too far ahead of you, mate.
translation.zh: 他应该在前方的不远处

translation.en: Yeah, I'll make it down in half the time.
Rob to Guy, you up there, mate?
translation.zh: 罗布呼叫盖 收到吗 朋友？

translation.en: Yeah, Guy to Rob. I'm here.
translation.zh: （普莫里峰 珠峰往西8公里处） 是 盖呼叫罗布 收到
听到你的回音真好 盖
第一营区 普莫里峰

translation.en: There you go, I got the old sly rotter.
translation.zh: 看吧 我联系上了那家伙

translation.en: Listen, I think you're on the wrong mountain, there.
translation.zh: 听好了 你好像登错了山峰

translation.en: Look, I can't talk, we gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 我现在无法说话 我们得赶紧离开

translation.en: All right, mate. Well, listen, you take care on the kiddie slope.
translation.zh: 好吧 朋友 你登上那座小山峰吧

translation.en: I'm gonna get back to the real thing.
translation.zh: 我得回到真正的珠穆朗玛峰上

translation.en: Yeah, don't worry, Rob. I'll keep an eye on you.
translation.zh: 好的 别担心 罗布 我会照料你

translation.en: Look, I'm telling you, I'm all right.
Don't do that to me again!
I'm gonna drop back with Frank, he's struggling a bit, all right?
translation.zh:
我得去查看法朗克
他情况不太妙 可以吗？

translation.en: Let's get him on the oxygen.
Rob Hall to Scott Fischer, Rob Hall to Scott Fischer,
translation.zh: 罗布哈尔呼叫史考特费雪…

translation.en: Mountain Madness, how do you copy?
translation.zh: 登山狂热顾问团队 有收到吗？

translation.en: I've been down to Base Camp, and I'm back at Camp One.
translation.zh:
我去了基地营区
现在回到了第一营区

translation.en: What, you're not gonna rest up a day first? No?
translation.zh: 什么 你不打算先歇息一天吗？

translation.en: Scott, you sound a little rough.
translation.zh: 史考特 你听起来状况不太好

translation.en: No way, José, what, miss out on all the fun?
translation.zh:
没可能的 何塞
我怎么能错过这些？

translation.en: That's a lot of up and down in one day, even for you, Scott.
translation.zh: 今天已经历很多突发状况了 史考特

translation.en: You know what they say, man.
It's not the altitude, it's the attitude.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay?
Just taking a shot of dexamethasone now.
translation.zh: 我注射了高山症的药物

translation.en: Well, just don't push yourself too hard, okay? Over and out.
translation.zh: 别太勉强自己 我收线了

translation.en: Rob, I've just been over to Mal's to get a weather update.
translation.zh:
罗布 我刚到马洛那里
查询了最新的天气预报

translation.en: And it could still go north, but, if it doesn't
translation.zh:
也许还会照常吹向北方
但若没有的话…

translation.en: it's gonna hit sometime on the 11th, I reckon.
translation.zh: 我猜测会在11号刮起暴风
那只是个天气预报 海伦

translation.en: This mountain makes its own weather. We're keeping an eye on it.
translation.zh: 这座山变化莫测 我们只得多加注意

translation.en: Yeah, sure, just letting you know.
translation.zh: 好的 我只想通报你

translation.en: Why do we do this to ourselves?
translation.zh: 我们为何要如此虐待自己？

translation.en: You know, I never told Krakauer this
translation.zh: 你知道我为何没告诉克拉考尔…

translation.en: when he was asking us why we climb Everest.
It's just like it's a cure.

translation.zh: 所以 你此刻感到愉快？

translation.en: You know, I'm starting to wonder.
translation.zh: 并没有 我开始怀疑自己的抉择

translation.en: for the rest of your life you'll be a guy that got to the top of Everest.
translation.zh:
就能毕生享有
成功征服珠穆朗玛峰的荣衔

translation.en: I just hope I get there.
translation.zh: 我只希望能够成功登上

translation.en: Just hope I get there, and get home.

translation.zh: 你的看法如何 麦克？

translation.en: Little bit of wind, up higher.
I mean, if it picks up, we can always come back down.
translation.zh: 如果风变大 我们大不了就下山

-我也这么想
-你必须做出抉择 罗布

translation.en: I'm hoping it's gonna die down after sundown.
translation.zh: 我想太阳下山后天气会转好

translation.en: Well, we don't go if it doesn't calm.
translation.zh: 天气若没好转的话 我们就别登山了

translation.en: I talk to Scott when he comes here.
translation.zh: 史考特回来时我会和他商谈

translation.en: What's Rob's... What's Rob's team doing?
translation.zh: 罗布的队伍进展的如何？

translation.en: He wants to see if this passes.
Come out and take a look.
At least somebody up there loves us.
Okay, everyone. We got a window.
translation.zh: 大家听好 我们有了段适合的时机

translation.en: We don't know how long it's gonna last, but we're gonna go for it.
translation.zh:
我们不知道好天气会耐到何时
我们得全力以赴

translation.en: Be ready in half an hour.
We'll have a 2:00 p.m. turnaround, let's climb this thing.
translation.zh: 下午2点得折返 我们来征服它吧

translation.en: Now the South Africans were late out of Camp Three.
translation.zh: 南非队太迟离开第三营区了

translation.en: They never made it into Camp Four. Probably got caught up in it.
translation.zh:
他们没有抵达第四营区
也许沿路被暴风阻挡

translation.en: Yeah, well, it hit us all night,
but now there's nothing. Absolutely nothing.
So, it's definitely worth a shot.
I'll radio out and tell everyone the news.
translation.zh: 我用无线机向大家宣布消息

translation.en: Yeah, ring Jan and tell her that we're heading out.
translation.zh: 要 请告诉珍我们出发了

translation.en: I'll call you, Helen, in 12 hours when we get to the summit.
translation.zh:
我会在12小时后
登上高峰时联系你 海伦

translation.en: Good luck, and Godspeed to you all.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 愿主保佑你们
好的 谢谢你海伦 再见

translation.en: I'll see you guys up there. -Take it easy, Scott. -Let's do it.
translation.zh:
-我们山峰见
-慢慢来 史考特

translation.en: Gonna get a couple hours of sleep, and I'll be right behind you.
translation.zh: 我小睡几个小时后就会赶上你
你得好好的休息 知道吗？

translation.en: You got the ropes for the Hillary Step?
translation.zh: 你修复好希拉里台阶的绳索了？

translation.en: Not a chance we can go faster here. It's too difficult.
translation.zh: 在这里没办法 太难了

translation.en: I had an operation a couple years ago, on my eyes. That might be it.
translation.zh: 也许是因为我几年前动过眼科手术

translation.en: You guys go in front of us.
All right, Beck, let's sit you down.
translation.zh: 好了 贝克 你坐下来

translation.en: I need to send you down with someone.
No, I don't wanna go down, Rob.
translation.zh: 不 我不要下山 罗布

translation.en: -No, you gotta go down. -I don't wanna go down.
translation.zh:
-不行 你必须下山去
-我不想

translation.en: You can wait here for half an hour. Beck, listen to me.
translation.zh:
你可以在这里等半小时
听我说 贝克

translation.en: If it gets better by then,
join in the queue and keep going up.
But if it doesn't get better, Beck, I'm sorry, mate, it's over.
translation.zh: 要不然 很抱歉结束了 贝克

translation.en: The Sherpas are gonna go up and drop off the extra oxygen at the South Summit
translation.zh: 当地族人在南麓处放置好氧气瓶后…

translation.en: then I'm gonna send one of them down for you. Is that clear?
translation.zh:
我会让其中一人前来协助你
明白吗？

translation.en: Sandy, do you want to go down?
Look, Lopsang, I'm gonna make it to the top. Do you understand?
translation.zh:
洛普桑
我一定要成功登上山峰 你听到吗？

translation.en: There is no rope! No rope.
Yeah, they should have been fixed.
translation.zh: 对啊 应该已经修复好了

translation.en: Do you have more in your pack?
Lopsang has the rope. He's not here!
translation.zh: 洛普桑有绳索 但他不在这里！

translation.en: Listen, we got a problem, here, mate.
translation.zh: 听着 我们这里出状况了 朋友

translation.en: There's no fixed ropes on the traverse to the Hillary Step, over.
translation.zh: 在通往希拉里台阶的斜坡上没有绳索
昂多吉和洛普桑在哪里？

translation.en: Yeah, I've got Ang Dorjee here, but there's no sign of Lopsang.
translation.zh: 昂多吉在我身旁 但没见到洛普桑

translation.en: So me, Neal, and Toli are gonna have to set some new ones, over.
translation.zh: 我、尼尔和托利得搞个新梯子

translation.en: One step at a time, Doug.
Come on, Dougie. Deep breaths, Dougie.
translation.zh: 来吧 道格 深呼吸

translation.en: Come on, mate, keep it on, keep it on.
translation.zh: 来吧 朋友 你可以的

translation.en: Deep breaths, Dougie, hang on. Hang on.
translation.zh: 深呼吸 道格 撑着

-我知道你行的 朋友
-是的

translation.en: I don't wanna see you back here a third time, mate.
translation.zh: 我不想你尝试第三次的登山

translation.en: There's no fixed ropes above the South Summit.
translation.zh: 南麓处没有固定好绳索
是 我知道 朋友…

translation.en: but we're sorting that situation out now.
Ran out of juice, waiting. Cold.
translation.zh: 等太久了 又冷又累
这是你的选择 朋友

translation.en: I don't wanna run out of oxygen up there.
translation.zh: 我可不想在山峰上缺氧

translation.en: Lou, Stuart, and John Taske just turned back.
translation.zh: 洛 斯图尔以及约翰拓史介刚折返了

translation.en: How are the conditions, so far?

translation.zh: 好的 请保持联络 罗布
好的 海伦 谢谢 再见

translation.en: I hope we're not looking at another year with no clients at the top.
translation.zh: 希望今年不要又是零登顶率

translation.en: Well, if they don't get a move on pretty soon,
they're out of time, aren't they?
translation.zh: 就会没时间了 不是吗？

translation.en: And what's Jon gonna say about that in his article?
translation.zh: 到时乔恩又会如何报道此事？
我是罗布 各位… （希拉里台阶 海拔8760米）

translation.en: We just lost Lou, Stu, and John Taske.
translation.zh: 洛 斯图尔以及约翰拓史介刚放弃了

translation.en: What's going on, what's the holdup?
translation.zh: 发生什么事 为什么不前进？

translation.en: We still have Toli and Neal at the top of the Step
translation.zh: 托利和尼尔还在台阶顶部… （早上11点52分）

translation.en: We're at the base of the Step, over.
Doug's just behind me, I left him behind to scoot forward.
translation.zh: 道格在我身后不远处 我得赶紧跟进

translation.en: Yeah, I got eyes on you right now, yep, that's me. Let's move as...
translation.zh: 好 我看到你了 对那是我…

translation.en: We'll start moving everybody up, as soon as we get the all clear.
translation.zh: 弄完后 我们就会让大家前进

translation.en: Rob to base, Rob to base, how copy, Helen?
translation.zh: 罗布呼叫基地营区 收到吗 海伦？

translation.en: -You all right? -Copy, Base Camp to Rob.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-收到 基地营区呼叫罗布

translation.en: Anyone managed to find out where he is, over?

translation.zh: 嗨 朋友！ 你的位置在哪里？

translation.en: We got a real logjam, here at the Hillary Step, over.
translation.zh: 我们在希拉里台阶遇到瓶颈了

translation.en: We're more than an hour behind!
translation.zh: 我们已经晚了一个多小时了！

translation.en: People are just sitting here, using up their oxygen.
translation.zh: 大家就只是坐在这里 消耗氧气瓶

translation.en: Get here as soon as you can.
Yeah, I got a little problem with my eyes.
translation.zh: 还好 只是眼睛出了点问题

translation.en: There's a logjam below the Hillary Step. It's crazy.
translation.zh:
我们在希拉里台阶遇到瓶颈
太疯狂了

translation.en: Nah, I can't, promised Rob I'd wait for him.
translation.zh: 不行 我答应过罗布我会等他
（中午12点45分） 好 我们现在爬上去！

-你不介意让我先上吧？
-为什么？

translation.en: I'm running pretty low on O.
We've had the all-clear on this end.
I'm gonna stay here with Yasuko, until we get a clear line.
translation.zh: 我会和康子留下 直到大家都上去

translation.en: I'll be here till I get a visual on Doug, over and out.
Come here. I'm so proud of you, Yasuko.
translation.zh: 过来 我以你为荣 康子

translation.en: Rob to Base, Rob to Base.
Rob, this is Helen, hello? Where are you?
translation.zh: 罗布 我是海伦 你的位置在哪里？

translation.en: I'm on the top of Everest, Helen, we made it.
translation.zh:
我在珠穆朗玛峰上
海伦 我们成功征服了

translation.en: We copy you loud and clear, Rob.
translation.zh: 我们听得一清二楚 罗布

translation.en: It's wonderful to hear your voice up there.
translation.zh: 能够从高峰上听到你的声音真好

translation.en: Who are you with, again, say?
At the moment, I'm with Mike and Yasuko.
-Headed down, Rob. -Now you have to go.

translation.zh: 罗布 回头见 谢谢你

translation.en: Jon K has already been and gone.
Doug is just coming over the horizon.
translation.zh: 道格刚出现在远处水平线上

translation.en: Beck was having a problem with his eyesight.
translation.zh: 贝克的视觉出了点问题

translation.en: He waited on the southeast ridge, on the Balcony
translation.zh: 他在东南山脊阳台那里…

translation.en: for the first people that came back, over.
translation.zh: 等候第一批折返的登山者

translation.en: And I guess you'll be leaving right away, yes?
translation.zh: 你也会立刻折返 对吗？

translation.en: We'll be off in a few minutes.
Just as soon as I see Doug, we'll be heading back down, over.
Right, understood. Well, that's terrific, Rob.
translation.zh: 知道了 干得好 罗布

translation.en: We're all keeping our fingers crossed for Doug.
My stomach's not so good, man.
Hey, Roberto. Where are the rest of your guys?
translation.zh: 喂 罗布 你的其他队员呢？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm pretty sure my whole team

translation.zh: 我整个队伍都成功了 对吗？

translation.en: Don't worry, I won't tell Krakauer.
translation.zh: 放心 我不会告诉克拉考尔的

translation.en: Well done, mate. I had a mixed bag.
translation.zh:
干得好 朋友
我的队伍能力参差不齐

translation.en: I'll have to give you this year.
Scott, you really don't look too good.
translation.zh: 史考特 你看起来很不妥

translation.en: Come on, mate, let's get him down.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们扶他下山
哈罗德 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm just trying to sort the O. I can't find any full ones.
translation.zh: 我想要吸氧气 但都是空瓶

translation.en: There's full bottles, I saw 'em on the way up.
translation.zh: 有新的瓶子 我上来的途中有看到

translation.en: No, I'm pretty sure you should have another look.
translation.zh: 不 我很确定 你再找看

translation.en: No, I just have, they're not full.
translation.zh: 我找过了 都是空瓶
哈罗德 听好 我明明看到…

translation.en: Look, mate, I checked twice, all right?
translation.zh: 朋友 我查看了两次 好吗？
道格 太迟了 好吗？

translation.en: You guys keep going, mate, I'll catch up.
translation.zh: 你们先走 我随后跟上

translation.en: Doug, Doug. Doug, listen to me.
-It's way too late. It's over. -No, come on!
translation.zh:
-太迟了 没机会了
-不 拜托！

translation.en: Listen to me, mate, I'm sorry,
translation.zh: 听我说 伙伴 我很抱歉…

translation.en: but I gotta turn you around.
It's right here, man. It's right here.
I'm not coming back next year, man, it's my last chance.
translation.zh:
我明年不会再回来了
这是我的最后机会

translation.en: You gotta let me do this.

translation.zh:
我们继续 -我们完成吧
-好的

-我们完成吧
-好的 -走吧
-谢谢你

translation.en: I'm not seeing too well, Jon. I'm freezing.
translation.zh: 我看不清楚 乔恩 我好冷

translation.en: You'll be okay. Mike's right behind me.
translation.zh: 你会没事的 麦克随后就到
撑着 道格 撑着
就是这样 你成功了！

translation.en: Guy to Rob, you read me, mate?
translation.zh: 盖呼叫罗布 收到吗？

translation.en: Guy to Rob, are you there?
translation.zh: 盖呼叫罗布 你在吗？

translation.en: Good on you, Doug. Come on.
translation.zh: 干得好 道格 走吧

translation.en: Come on, let's get you up.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们把你拉起来

translation.en: -Need more O. -No, Doug, we can't give you more O.
translation.zh:
-我需要更多氧气
-不行 道格 不能再吸氧气了

translation.en: We gotta get down to the South Summit, come on.
translation.zh: 我们得赶紧抵达南麓 走吧

translation.en: Guy Cotter to Everest Base Camp. You there, Helen?
translation.zh:
盖科特呼叫基地营区
你在吗 海伦？

translation.en: Guy, this is Helen, how's it going?
translation.zh: 盖 我是海伦 情况如何？

translation.en: I got a clear view of the summit
and we've still got climbers up there. They're not any of ours, right?
translation.zh:
还有一些登山者在顶上
但不属于我们的队伍 对吗？

translation.en: We got three up, and they're all on their way down.
translation.zh:
我们还有三位队员未归
但在下山的途中

translation.en: Well, what are they doing there so late?
translation.zh: 都这么迟了 他们怎么还在山上？

translation.en: They had a 2:00 turnaround time, they're way past it.
translation.zh:
他们应该在2点时折返的
现在已经严重超时了

translation.en: Yeah, we got cloud coming up through the valley, it's a lot of it.
Thanks, I'm calling them now, Guy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 盖 我立刻通知他们

translation.en: Rob, come in, this is Helen.
translation.zh: 呼叫罗布 我是海伦

translation.en: Rob, come in, this is Helen.
translation.zh: 呼叫罗布 我是海伦

translation.en: Easy, easy, easy, Dougie! There you go.
It's Mike, Beck. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 贝克 我是麦克 你在这里做什么？
我看不见 情况很糟

translation.en: We got a problem with Beck.
Hey, Mike, we're getting low on O. We gotta move.
translation.zh:
喂 麦克
我们的氧气快完了 快走吧

translation.en: Gonna get you to stand up, okay?
translation.zh: 我们把你扶起来 好吗？

translation.en: Mike, Harold, Ang Dorjee, put the brakes on, guys, we got a problem.
translation.zh:
麦克、哈罗德、昂多吉
停下来 出状况了
氧气瓶用完了 道格

translation.en: We're out of gas. Need to keep moving, come on.
translation.zh: 没氧气了 我们得赶紧走

translation.en: Mike, Harold, do you copy? I need someone...
translation.zh: 麦克和哈罗德 收到吗？我需要…

translation.en: I need someone to come back up with oxygen, over.
translation.zh: 我需要有人带氧气瓶上来

translation.en: Doug, come on, mate, come on!
translation.zh: 道格 走啊朋友 拜托！

translation.en: Has anyone got eyes on Ang Dorjee?
Mate, I've just had Ang Dorjee go past me, heading down, over.
translation.zh: 昂多吉刚走过 正下山去

translation.en: Can you stop him, can you turn him around? I need someone to come back up now.
translation.zh: 你可以叫他返回来吗？我需要帮忙

translation.en: Base Camp, do you copy, over?

translation.zh: 海伦呼叫罗布 请说

translation.en: Helen, please. I need a bottle of gas at the top of the Hillary Step.
translation.zh:
海伦 拜托 我需要
有人在希拉里台阶放置氧气瓶

translation.en: I can't get him down without it.
translation.zh: 没有氧气瓶他就无法下山

translation.en: Understood that you need a bottle of oxygen at the bottom of the Hillary Step.
translation.zh:
收到 你需要在希拉里台阶底部
放置氧气瓶

translation.en: We are sending it up to you, as soon as we can.
translation.zh: 我们会尽快给你送上去

translation.en: At the top, at the top.
The last thing I said to Ang Dorjee was
"Please, leave two bottles of gas at the South Summit."
there's oxygen at the South Summit, right?
translation.zh: 南麓处有放置氧气瓶 对吗？
不 罗布 我是哈罗德

translation.en: There's no oxygen at South Summit.
translation.zh: 南麓处没有放置氧气瓶
我重复 没有氧气瓶

translation.en: Ang Dorjee stashed four bottles there, Harold.
translation.zh:
昂多吉应该有在那里
放置四瓶的 哈罗德
哈罗德 你的位置在哪里？

translation.en: half an hour to get back up to the South Summit.
translation.zh: 半小时后才能返回南麓

translation.en: If you don't have oxygen, mate, don't come up, don't come up.
translation.zh: 你若没有氧气瓶的话 就别上来

translation.en: I'm coming up to you, Rob.
translation.zh: 我现在上来找你 罗布

translation.en: Doug, come on, mate, come on!
translation.zh: 道格 走吧 伙伴！
罗布 这里是基地营区
罗布 这里是基地营区

translation.en: Rob, can you get yourself down?
translation.zh: 罗布 你自己有办法下山吗？

translation.en: Caro, we're not at that point, yet.
translation.zh: 卡罗 我们还没有到那种紧急状态

translation.en: Rob, can you let us know who you're with?
translation.zh: 罗布 你现在和谁在一起？

translation.en: Come on, Dougie, come on, mate. One more effort, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托 道格 快走 撑着

translation.en: Rob, what is Doug's state of consciousness?
translation.zh: 罗布 道格的清醒程度如何？

translation.en: He collapsed after we ran out of oxygen.
translation.zh: 氧气用完后他就撑不住了

translation.en: Okay, give him eight milligrams of dexamethasone.
translation.zh:
好的 请给他注射八毫克的
高山症药物
是两颗药丸的份量 罗布

translation.en: Go ahead, Guy, I got you, mate.
Rob, I suggest you get yourself down.
translation.zh: 罗布 我建议你自己下山

translation.en: You know you're doing no good up there.
translation.zh: 你这样撑着根本于事无补

translation.en: Now, we've got people that we can send up to help Doug
translation.zh: 我们可以派人上去救道格…

translation.en: but you've gotta get yourself down, do you understand?
translation.zh: 但你必须自行下山 明白吗？

translation.en: I mean, come on, man, we're playing with a man's life here.
translation.zh: 拜托 我们别拿一条人命开玩笑

translation.en: There's no way I'm leaving Doug behind.
No, we gotta keep moving, we're in some trouble.
translation.zh: 我们得赶紧上路 否则会有麻烦

translation.en: Yeah, Helen's gonna need some help
so I'm gonna try and make my way back. Okay?
translation.zh: 我得折返了 可以吗？

translation.en: Send Anatoli back with some O.
No, I'm not leaving you behind, Doug.
translation.zh: 我是不会丢下你的 道格

translation.en: No, Doug, come on, you're coming with me!
translation.zh: 不行 道格 你得跟我一起走！

translation.en: I need 10 good minutes, Doug, come on!
translation.zh: 十分钟就好 道格 走吧！
拜托 道格 走啊 伙伴

translation.en: Ten minutes. We'll get to the bottom of the Step.
translation.zh: 十分钟就会抵达台阶底部
这只脚 快啊 道格！

translation.en: Hold that down. Come on, come on! Get those chairs!
translation.zh: 把帐篷固定好 快！用椅子！

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Come on, Dougie!
Doug! I'm gonna go to the South Summit to get oxygen.
translation.zh: 道格！我会到南麓处拿氧气瓶
听到吗 朋友？我们需要氧气

translation.en: Beck! Stop! That's the wrong way!
translation.zh: 贝克！站住！那是错误的方向！

translation.en: Here, I found some half-empty ones.
translation.zh: 在这里 我找到半罐

translation.en: They're out there, I need help!
translation.zh: 他们还在山上 我需要帮助！

translation.en: I go find them! You stay here!
translation.zh: 我去找他们！你留在这里！

translation.en: Here, give me that, come on.

translation.zh: 没办法 开关结冰了！

translation.en: Why haven't I heard from you? Why hasn't anybody called me?
translation.zh: 你为何没联络我？为何没人打给我？

translation.en: They've been hit by a storm, Jan. It's really bad.
translation.zh: 他们遇上风暴了 珍 事态严重
我们不是很确定 但是…

translation.en: he was still on the summit at 4:00.
translation.zh: 他在下午4点时还在顶峰上
糟了 他有办法下山吗？
罗布一人可以 但同行的道格没办法

translation.en: There's at least 13 people stranded up there
and, well, the storm is getting worse.

translation.zh: 他会把他们都带下来的

translation.en: -Helen, do you understand? -Helen! Give me an update!
translation.zh:
-海伦 你有听明白吗？
-海伦！给我最新的情报！

translation.en: Jan, yeah, we will get him.
translation.zh: 是的 珍 我们会把他救下来

translation.en: And I will call you the minute I hear from him.
translation.zh: 我一有他的消息就通知你

translation.en: As soon as I hear from him.
-Where is he? -Guy, I haven't heard from him.
translation.zh:
-他人在哪里？
-盖 我没有他的消息

translation.en: Rob? It's Guy, where are you?
translation.zh: 罗布？我是盖 你在什么位置？

translation.en: Guy, I've been doing that for the last two hours.
translation.zh:
盖 我过去两个小时
一直在尝试联络他
好的 罗布 我是盖

translation.en: Once you catch a break, you move, you know the drill.
translation.zh: 你休息片刻后就得前进 你是知道的

translation.en: We've got a stash of oxygen on the South Col.
translation.zh: 我们在南坳处放置了氧气瓶

translation.en: -Whoever needs it can have it. -That's the way, thank you.
Mal's team are gonna go up, they're gonna mount a search as soon as they can.
translation.zh:
马洛的队伍会上山
展开搜寻救援活动

translation.en: Anyone who's going, we're gonna leave at dawn, weather permitting.
translation.zh:
若有谁想加入
我们会在破晓时分天气好转时出发
收到 海伦 破晓时分

translation.en: Go let Ed know what's going on, I'll be right behind you.
translation.zh: 去通知爱德 我随后跟上

translation.en: Rob. Rob, can you hear me?
David Breashears has a stash of oxygen at the South Col that we can use.
translation.zh:
大尉卜赖西在
南坳放置了可以使用的氧气瓶

translation.en: All right, mate, we're organizing a team, we're coming to get you.
translation.zh: 撑着 朋友 我们组队来救你了

translation.en: Rob, talk to me, please. Pick up.
translation.zh: 罗布 拜托 说说话
说话啊 朋友 拜托

translation.en: Is there any word on the others?
Anatoli managed to get three clients back from the South Col last night,
translation.zh:
阿纳托利昨晚成功
从南坳救下三位顾客…

translation.en: but Beck and Yasuko are still out there.
translation.zh: 但还是没有贝克和康子的消息

translation.en: They're trying to mount a search
translation.zh: 他们想要组织搜寻救援活动…

translation.en: but everyone who's been up there is exhausted.
translation.zh: 但所有的登山队都累坏了

translation.en: Rob, where are you? We're sending people for you.
translation.zh:
罗布 你的位置在哪里？
我们派人去救你
罗布 这里是基地营区

translation.en: Hey, mate. Yeah, I know. I know, mate. I know.
But you gotta keep on moving.
I can't feel my hands, they're frozen.
translation.zh: 失去知觉了 冻僵了

translation.en: That's good. Yeah, you gotta get that mask working. Yeah?
translation.zh: 对 你得使用面罩 对吗？

translation.en: The sun's gonna come up and,
you know, you can get warmer, you can get moving.
translation.zh: 到时候 你会暖和些 再继续前进
盖 哈罗德本来在这里
罗布 道格跟你在一起吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna need a little help.
Okay, Rob, you gotta get yourself down. Where are you?
translation.zh:
好的 罗布
你必须自己下山 你在什么位置？

translation.en: In that little dip just below the South Summit.
All right. You can do this.
You just gotta, you know, pull yourself up out of that dip
translation.zh: 你得自己从那个角落移动…

translation.en: and slide the rest of the way.
I'm gonna need a little help.
We've got some Sherpas coming up there with tea, oxygen.
translation.zh: 我们找了当地族人给你派送氧气瓶

translation.en: You just gotta come on down, mate.

translation.zh:
-接通至罗布吗？
-是的 把她接通

translation.en: Let's just try it. Let's just...
Put the sat phone next to the radio.
translation.zh: 把卫星电话筒放在无线机旁边

translation.en: Yeah, if anyone can motivate him to move, then Jan will.
translation.zh: 只有珍能够鼓励他前进

translation.en: Guy to Rob. Can you read me?
translation.zh: 盖呼叫罗布 收到吗？

-我们正在…
-罗布 你还在吗？

translation.en: Rob, I've got Jan for you.
translation.zh: 罗布 我为你接通了珍

translation.en: Hi, sweetheart, how are you doing?
translation.zh: 嗨 亲爱的 你还好吗？

translation.en: But the sun'll warm you soon.
translation.zh: 太阳很快的就会暖和你

translation.en: We're sending people up to you with tea and O's.
translation.zh: 我们正派人给你带了热茶与氧气瓶

translation.en: But you've gotta get moving. Rob? Can you hear me?
translation.zh: 但你必须继续前进 听到吗 罗布？

translation.en: You've gotta get your circulation going.
You do it... You do it right now.
translation.zh: 你现在…现在就开始移动

translation.en: It's gonna take all we got

translation.zh: 就会耗尽我们所有的体力

translation.en: Helen, it's Mike here. Do you copy?
translation.zh: 海伦 我是麦克 收到吗？

translation.en: Come in, Mike. What do you got?
translation.zh: 麦克 请说 有什么消息？

translation.en: did not make it back to camp.
Okay, Mike. Thanks for letting us know.
translation.zh: 知道了 麦克 谢谢你的通知

translation.en: Helen Base Camp. Helen Base Camp.
There is a very bad storm again.

translation.zh:
-你做决定吧 昂多吉
-抱歉

translation.en: We'll try to again when the storm's passed.
translation.zh: 我们在暴风结束后再继续

translation.en: We'll leave some tea and oxygen here. Sorry.
translation.zh:
我们会把热茶和
氧气瓶留在这里 抱歉

translation.en: We have to tell Rob they're not coming.
translation.zh: 我们得告诉罗布他们不会上山去了
喂 罗布 我是盖
我不停地在发抖 朋友

translation.en: The boys have hit a bit of high wind.
And your best shot is gonna be to get lower.
translation.zh: 你的唯一希望变的渺茫了

translation.en: I think I can hang out here another night.
translation.zh: 我想我能够再支撑一个晚上

translation.en: We'll try again first thing, okay?
translation.zh: 我们明天一早再尝试 好吗？

translation.en: He's just below the South Summit.
He's got oxygen, but it's iced up.
translation.zh: 他有氧气瓶 但都结冰了

translation.en: We don't know whether he's been able to free it.
translation.zh: 我们无法确定他是否成功使用

translation.en: You have to get him down before dark. He won't survive another night.
translation.zh:
你必须在天黑前把他救下来
他无法再多撑一晚

translation.en: But the storm's come back, real bad.
We can't get anyone up to him tonight.
translation.zh: 我们今晚无法把他救下来

translation.en: He might as well be on the moon.
translation.zh: 他正处在一个没人能帮助他的处境

translation.en: Can you put me on with him again?
Hold on. Give me a sec.
I might have a little frostbite.
I'm looking forward to making it all better.
translation.zh: 我很期待能让这一切变好

translation.en: I can't wait for you to come home.
Will you call her that for me?
translation.zh: 替我为她取这个名字 好吗？

translation.en: I don't think I'm gonna get to meet her.
If anyone can make it, you can.
translation.zh: 若是你 就一定能够战胜

translation.en: I'm here, come on. Come on.
David Breashears and the IMAX team are gonna get him down to Camp One.
translation.zh:
大尉卜赖西和IMAX团队
会把他带到第一营区

translation.en: We don't even know how, but he is alive.
translation.zh:
他还活着 我们都不知道
他是怎么做到的
但是 桃子 问题是…

translation.en: we can't get him down the Icefall.
translation.zh: 我们无法把他运下冰瀑
我会把他接下山 好的

translation.en: Okay, what do we need? We need a helicopter, right?
translation.zh: 我们需要一台直升机 对吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but they can't take a helicopter up that high
translation.zh: 对 但直升机无法飞往那种高度…

translation.en: because the air is too thin.
We should try, but it is one heck of a risk.
translation.zh: 我们可以尝试 但险境重重

translation.en: And he's not in a good way, Peach,
translation.zh: 他的状况不太乐观 桃子…

translation.en: so I don't want you to get your hopes up too high.
I know you are. Come on.
Yes, I'd like the number of the American Embassy in Kathmandu, Nepal.
translation.zh:
是的 请给我美国驻尼泊尔加德满都
大使馆的联络号码

-是的 尼泊尔
-请接通大使
抱歉 亲爱的 我无法待候

translation.en: No, you listen, sir, my husband's already died once
translation.zh:
不 先生 你听好
我丈夫已经死过一次了…

translation.en: as you'll have seen on the news.
Trust me, having him die a second time is not gonna play well on CNN.
translation.zh:
相信我 你不会想要
全国新闻台再次报道他的死讯

translation.en: Look like you are, a little bit.
Rob's still up there right now.
And Doug? What's he up to?
I don't know, no one's ever tried to fly higher than Base Camp before,
translation.zh:
我不确定 没人尝试往
飞往基地营区以上的高度…

translation.en: they're gonna give it a go.
You find an LZ, just mark it out with whatever you can.
translation.zh:
找个降落点
然后找东西把它标示出来

translation.en: Okay, worth a try. Thanks, Guy.
translation.zh: 好的 这值得尝试 谢谢你 盖

translation.en: Got a chopper coming in, we need to make an LZ.
translation.zh: 我们必须为直升机划出降落点

translation.en: We got a chopper coming in!
Clear everyone back to the tents!
Thanks. Keep it clear, keep this whole area clear.
translation.zh: 谢谢 请疏散所有人
卢卡拉塔 一切就绪

translation.en: You land here, we'll never get back up.
translation.zh: 我们要是降落了 就再也无法起飞！
好的 少校 我们返回吧

translation.en: We can't get any more out. It's as light as we're gonna get it!
translation.zh:
不能再取走任何重量了
只能减轻到这地步了

translation.en: Come on! You can do it!
Come on, buddy. You're nearly there.
translation.zh: 撑着 朋友 就快到了

translation.en: Yeah, it's just him, just one! There.
I'm going to lift the tail up, to fly us over the edge.
translation.zh: 我得把机尾抬起 以便能飞过山崖

translation.en: Fall a bit, until the blades catch on the air.
translation.zh: 再稍微坠落直到螺旋桨撑起空气转动

translation.en: Come on, let's get you inside.
